gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hawks 120, Celtics 118
gameRecap.excerpt: The Hawks mount the largest comeback by any team this season as they overcome a 30-point deficit and defeat the Celtics, 120-118. De’Andre Hunter led the way for the Hawks with 24 points (4-8 3PT FG) and seven rebounds, while Dejounte Murray added 19 points, five rebounds and a career-high tying 15 assists in the victory. Jayson Tatum (37 points, eight rebounds, five assists) and Jaylen Brown (24 points, four rebounds) combined for 61 points for the Celtics in the losing effort. The Hawks improve to 32-39 on the season, while the Celtics snap a nine-game win streak as they fall to 57-15.
